But I still think the question you want to be asking is not "How do I become a moderator?" but "How do I become a better forum user?" because that is what can really get you to where you want to be.

Right..... I have a serious question for the moderators.

Keep in mind that I am 56 and no child or young teen that is titillated (is that word allowed?) with silly child sexual talk....

This forums is becoming a joke...... seriously...

When I talked about a B O O B Y prize.... the word was censored to "Bloby" which isn't even a word... I corrected it twice only to have the same thing happen... I thought it was me with my double vision making the typos but then I twigged that it was the word censor. B O O B Y is a legitimate word... when talking about a B O O B Y prize, there is no alternative.... but that word is censored... it shouldn't be! I know this is a family site, but you would have to be.... strange.... to consider that word needed to be censored.

This site is fast becoming a joke... there are rules to tell us what we cannot talk about... words we cannot use.... and fair enough IN SOME CASES.... but NOT that word.

There is a bird called the Red-footed b o o b y (Sula sula) ..... we cannot talk about that bird either!!!

My question is.... why does this site act like a nanny with such an overly strict word censor... there is no need for it surely.... some words... YES.... but dammit (is that word allowed?) its TOO STRICT!

However..... the word you are thinking of ends in an IE .... not a Y .... seriously.... its getting to be like a Kindergarten here.
